name: Secret Agent Sniper: City Atta
description:
Secret Agent Sniper: City Attack 3 is a secret agent game of a sniper 3D where sniper shooting and kill shot is required by the sniper shooter.
Features :
Multiple Guns Rifle Upgrades
Kill Criminals, Thugs & Gangsters
Amazing sound effects and music
Real 3S Animation & Environments
Aim, Shoot & Kill
Headshots Action
More than Achievements to Unlock
